description: A project contains information about the overall project.
title: project

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

contributors.description: List of people contributing to any aspect of the project.
contributors.example: List of authors for a publication resulting from this project.

supplementary_files.example: For example, experimental documents, photos, etc. Please list the file names, separated by double pipes. You will be asked to upload these files separately.

publications.description: A list of publications resulting from this project.

insdc_project.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) project accession, if data has already been submitted to the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI.
insdc_project.example: Must start with DRP, ERP, or SRP.

geo_series.description: GEO accession number, if data has already been submitted to NCBI GEO.

array_express_investigation.description: EBI ArrayExpress accession number, if data has already been submitted to ArrayExpress.

insdc_study.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) study accession, if data has already been submitted to the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI.
insdc_study.example: Must start with PRJE, PRJN, or PRJD.

funders.description: A list of funders supporting this project.
